channel.title: Java icon
channel.description: How do I change the default java cup icon? I've gone through at least 3 pages on google they all cause null pointer exceptions [code] String imgURL = "icon/icon.png"; frame.setIconImage(new ImageIcon(imgURL).getImage());//null pointer here ._. [/code] Any idea why >_<

item.title: Java icon
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Are you sure your frame isn’t null?

Read full topic

item.title: Java icon
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:1, topic:450462”]How do I change the default java cup icon?
I’ve gone through at least 3 pages on google they all cause null pointer exceptions

String imgURL = "icon/icon.png";
frame.setIconImage(new ImageIcon(imgURL).getImage());//null pointer here ._.

Any idea why >_<[/quote]is the path right? try “./icon/icon.png” and make sure it exists

Read full topic
